summary: Adds a Dwemer inspired garden and cave beneath the cellar of Lakeview Manor. Make over of my very first mod. Many plantable soils and aesthetically pleasing.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#1155cc][size=6][u][b][img]http://i.imgur.com/KIuX2eM.png[/img]
What is this mod?
[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=4][color=#3d85c6]Lakeview Lost Gardens is a mod that adds a stunning garden beneath the Lakeview Manor. It's dwemer/blackreach inspired and adds many plantable plots. There is also a small cave attached which holds a few chests and continues the Blackreach theme. I always loved those mushrooms.[/color]
[color=#3d85c6]This is a remake of my very first mod. It's not identical and was made from scratch (except the cave design was inspired by an exsisting vanilla cave), but the overall idea is the same. [/color]
[color=#efefef]This mod makes no changes to the exterior or interior of Lakeview Manor except for adding a door in the cellar.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I2GFlAA.png[/img]
[/color][/size][color=#1155cc][size=6][b][u]Features
[/u][/b][/size][/color][color=#6d9eeb][size=4]- 3 or 4 chests (1 is a master chest with some nice items)
- Adds 55 plantable spots
- Gem Mines
- A few ore mines
- Beautifully decorated 
- Insect Spawners
- Fish Spawners
- Waterfalls
- Many plants and flowers
 Dwemer inspired architecture and furnishings
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9lK11bb.png[/img]
[/size][/color][size=6][color=#e06666]Requirements[/color]
[/size][size=4]Skyrim up to date
Hearthfire
Dragonborn
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sZWPhbB.png[/img]
[/size][size=6][b][u]Compatibility
[/u][/b][/size][size=4]Compatible with just about everything. May conflict with any mod that alters the Lakeview Cellar (could cover the door I added)[/size][/center][size=4]
[center]My Mods:
